第18堂
授課方式：
混合式課程：提供20小時面授教學/提供16小時線上學習：

outline.en:
Week 1
§ Course Introduction
Week2 ~ Week17
Lecture Regular classes ＆ Online reading and writing, or
LMS online materials and quiz Lessons
Week18
Final
This is a blended teaching class. The course provides students a time-flexible online learning environment, where students learn from the online materials by themselves asynchronously whenever available. In addition, instructors will provide 18-hour classroom lessons, plus individual tutoring sessions to students who need one-on-one assistance in reading and writing skills.
